items.summary: Move `AuthProvider` to the absolute top of the React app tree so it unconditionally wraps `RouterProvider` and therefore all routes/components (including `CreatorZoneTab`), eliminating the runtime crash `Uncaught Error: useAuth must be used within AuthProvider` during login/logout transitions.

Audit and remove any duplicate/nested `AuthProvider` placements (if any exist) so there is exactly one `AuthProvider` instance wrapping the entire routed tree; ensure no route/layout/component can mount outside it.
Redeploy a new version after applying the structural provider-order fix and verify the fix in the deployed environment (not just local dev).
